Name: component_height
Comments: height of the component in inches

Name: component_width
Comments: width of the component in inches

Name: component_floor_clearance
Comments: floor clearance of the component in inches

Name: hole_margin_bottom
Expression: 1.72 in + if(( component_floor_clearance_limited == 1 in ) and not(door_wall_post_hinging); notching_z; 0 in)

Name: door_notching_left
Expression: if(not(component_floor_clearance_limited == 1 in); 0; if(door_drilling_left and door_wall_post_hinging; 0; if(door_drilling_right and door_wall_keep_latching; 0; 1)))

Name: door_notching_right
Expression: if(not(component_floor_clearance_limited == 1 in); 0; if(door_drilling_right and door_wall_post_hinging; 0; if(door_drilling_left and door_wall_keep_latching; 0; 1)))

Name: door_drilling_left
Expression: if(door_hinging_left_default and door_swinging_out; 1; if(door_hinging_right and door_swinging_in_default; 1; 0))
